body.p:
To His Excellency. Thos E Bramlette
Governor of commonwealth of Kentucky

Your Petitioner Milton Moore of Trimble co Kentucky would respectfully represent that he was fined at the May Term 1864 term of the circuit court for Trimble co Kentucky the sum of $30 -- for Gaming He respectfully asks that the said fine be remitted because he was not aware that he was guilty of any offence for merely pitching Dollars for amusement or a Treat. He would therefore respectfully ask your excellency to remit said fine as he is poor and unable to pay the fine
We the undersigned citizens of Trimble co Ky join the above petitioner in his prayer &c

S Gatewood
S W Burnett
W. F. Peak
Allen Burnett
W P Maddox
D S Lane
A J Bartlett
F E Skidmore
Willis Bell
John, N, Tague
Addam Leatherman

Trimble Cir Ct
vs
Milton Moore
for
$30 --
Gaming
Remitted 15 Nov/65
